value.title: StarCraft 2: SERRAL VS MARU!
value.excerpt: It finally happened! Serral versus Maru in a best-of-3 series of StarCraft 2. These two have somehow managed to dodge each other in many tournaments, but today it's finally time to watch them face off against one another.
